document.topic_text: Difference between revisions of "Pokémon Gotta Catch 'Em All volume 4" From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia. {{publications/h|Johto}} {{publications|cover=Pokémon Gotta Catch Em All JP volume 4.png|edition=First|country=Japan|company=Shogakukan|date=October 2000|ISBN=4091495044}} {{publications|cover=Pokémon Gotta Catch Em All JP volume 4.png|edition=First|country=Japan|company=Shogakukan|date=October 2000|ISBN=4091495044}} + {{publications|cover=|edition=First|country={{color2|000|Pokémon in Greater China|Mainland China}}|company=Jilin Publishing Group|date=November 1, 2005|ISBN=9787538619164}} {{publications|cover=Pokémon Gotta Catch 'Em All KO volume 4.png|edition=First|country={{color2|000|Pokémon in South Korea|South Korea}}|company=Daewon C.I.|date=June 26, 2001|ISBN=9788952822864}} {{publications|cover=Pokémon Gotta Catch 'Em All KO volume 4.png|edition=First|country={{color2|000|Pokémon in South Korea|South Korea}}|company=Daewon C.I.|date=June 26, 2001|ISBN=9788952822864}}
